name: Parkourer(indev)
description:
note:still in development (not finished yet)

its basically a ball that needs to reach a pink square (im not sure  if its pink or not mabe red idk) and to reach it u need to do Parkour (its my first project without a tutorial for a full game that means that i created it on my own

controles:

WASD to move around you can use the arrows too

space to jump

R,Del,or BackSpace to Restart the level

still 1 lvl wait the final result

thats it

there will be so much more things in the future

the pics in the down is the game first released and the pics at the top is the game now.

(*note:when u first enter the game go to options and change the resolution to 1080 for the best menu experince)
